snippet: Every Tuesday, Curry Without Worry distributes spicy restaurant-quality meals — what its founder calls “soul-pleasing food” — at no cost to both the hungry and the well-fed.
lead_paragraph: Every Tuesday, Curry Without Worry distributes spicy restaurant-quality meals — what its founder calls “soul-pleasing food” — at no cost to both the hungry and the well-fed.

headline.main: Bringing the Haves and Have-Nots Together for Curry and Compassion
headline.seo: Curry Without Worry Soup Kitchen Feeds the Haves and the Have-Nots
headline.print_headline: Bringing the Haves and Have-Nots Together for Curry and Compassion
